meta.description: Clariss is a highly customizable theme with an optimized layout you can make your own. Put the spotlight on your brand while offering the superior user experience that drives conversions. Clariss is fully compatible with the Page Builder, allowing you to tweak every element of your theme without touching a single line of code. Display your choice of banners to draw attention where you want it, and further attract customers with optional links to your recent blog posts, deep navigation that makes even the largest store simple to browse, and much more. Any of the 4 included styles can be personalized for any industry.
